Heinrich Fink (31 March 1935 – 1 July 2020) was a German theologian and politician. He was a member of Die Linke. From 1998 to 2001, Fink was a member of the German Bundestag for the Party of Democratic Socialism.
In 1991, Fink was fired from Humboldt University of Berlin due to allegations against him being a former informer for the East German state security office, the Stasi. Fink denies the allegations.
Fink died on 1 July 2020 in Berlin, aged 85.
